name: CQ.Ext.Template
doc:
Represents an HTML fragment template. Templates may be precompiled
for greater performance.
For e...

configs.name: compiled
configs.doc: Specify true to compile the template immediately (see compile). Defaults to false.

configs.name: re
configs.doc: The regular expression used to match template variables. Defaults to:re : /\{([\w\-]+)\}/g       ...

methods.name: Template.from
methods.doc: <static> Creates a template from the passed element's value (display:none textarea, preferr...

methods.name: append
methods.doc:
Applies the supplied values to the template and appends
the new node(s) to the specified el.
For ...

methods.name: apply
methods.doc:
Alias for applyTemplate
Returns an HTML fragment of this template with the specified values applied.

methods.name: applyTemplate
methods.doc: Returns an HTML fragment of this template with the specified values applied.

methods.name: compile
methods.doc: Compiles the template into an internal function, eliminating the RegEx overhead.

methods.name: insertAfter
methods.doc: Applies the supplied values to the template and inserts the new node(s) after el.

methods.name: insertBefore
methods.doc: Applies the supplied values to the template and inserts the new node(s) before el.

methods.name: insertFirst
methods.doc: Applies the supplied values to the template and inserts the new node(s) as the first child of el.

methods.name: overwrite
methods.doc: Applies the supplied values to the template and overwrites the content of el with the new node(s).

methods.name: set
methods.doc: Sets the HTML used as the template and optionally compiles it.
